Articles.Content:
Wrote this when i was bored and had no Wi-Fi connection, pretty weird but well i had to post it :

Oh you dres, the loneliest of all,

the planet not visited in career mode.

The planet which never sees a docking node

forever alone in the vast darkness of space.

Not do you have a moon or an egg,

Flying there in the unvisited space.

Being there with the Jumbo-64 and the Linear RCS

Being great but bullied nevertheless.

But a day, where no jool is used for aerobraking,

maybe one day, a ship will enter the horizon.

Powered by the great Jumbo-64 not even shaking.

Maybe a day things will change,

Rockomax engines will fly trought the air,

Dres being visited here and there,

maybe a day things will change..

but now it just stands there as an unfinished

chapter of space race.

R.I.P Jumbo-64

Poor Dres. Such a lonely planet :c

On another note, I feel that R.I.P. Jumbo-64 should be a new signature line. :b
